sense.gloss: match between wrestlers from the same stable

meanings: counter for copies of a newspaper or magazine

sdata.j: その↑晩↑↓ばん↓は↑見知↑↓みし↓らぬ↑人↑↓ひと↓と|↑相部屋|↑↓あいべや↓になった。
sdata.e: I doubled up with a stranger that night.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓と|↑相部屋|↑↓あいべや↓でもかまわない。
sdata.e: I don't mind sharing the room with him.
